news_results.title: Caesars And MGM Boards Lose Cybersecurity Gambles
news_results.snippet: MGM took the antiquated route. Only one board member has any discernable tech experience — audit committee chair Gregory Spierkel, who ended his stint as CEO of Ingram Micro in 2012. Its board lacks a technology committee and cyber governance is tasked to the audit committee for occasional discussion.

news_results.title: Hackers Who Breached Casino Giants MGM, Caesars Also Hit 3 Other Firms, Okta Says
news_results.snippet: David Bradbury, chief security officer of the identity management company Okta, said five of the company's clients, including MGM and Caesars, had fallen victim to hacking groups known as ALPHV and Scattered Spider since August.
